title: hlt's classic game pack #3
description:
hlt&#039;s classic game pack #3
--------------------------

Many of these won&#039;t run on modern computers. Slow-down utils or something like VM-ware is recommended, or try http://www.playfilez.com to check for cracked updates that might help.

The pack includes (all cracked):

Afterlife (c) LucasArts
Area 51 (c) GT Interactive/Midway
Broken Sword
